ud1.8:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava savatthiyam viharati jetavane anathapindikassa arame.
ud1.8:1.3: Tena kho pana samayena ayasma sangamaji savatthim anuppatto hoti bhagavantam dassanaya.
ud1.8:2.1: Tena kho pana samayena ayasma sangamaji annatarasmim rukkhamule divaviharam nisinno hoti.
ud1.8:2.2: Atha kho ayasmato sangamajissa puranadutiyika yenayasma sangamaji tenupasankami; upasankamitva ayasmantam sangamajim etadavoca:
ud1.8:2.4: Evam vutte, ayasma sangamaji tunhi ahosi.
ud1.8:3.1: Dutiyampi kho ayasmato sangamajissa puranadutiyika ayasmantam sangamajim etadavoca:
ud1.8:3.3: Dutiyampi kho ayasma sangamaji tunhi ahosi.
ud1.8:4.1: Tatiyampi kho ayasmato sangamajissa puranadutiyika ayasmantam sangamajim etadavoca:
ud1.8:4.3: Tatiyampi kho ayasma sangamaji tunhi ahosi.
ud1.8:5.1: Atha kho ayasmato sangamajissa puranadutiyika tam darakam ayasmato sangamajissa purato nikkhipitva pakkami:
ud1.8:6.1: Atha kho ayasma sangamaji tam darakam neva olokesi napi alapi.
ud1.8:6.2: Atha kho ayasmato sangamajissa puranadutiyika aviduram gantva apalokenti addasa ayasmantam sangamajim tam darakam neva olokentam napi alapantam, disvanassa etadahosi:
ud1.8:6.5: Addasa kho bhagava dibbena cakkhuna visuddhena atikkantamanusakena ayasmato sangamajissa puranadutiyikaya evarupam vippakaram.
ud1.8:7.1: Atha kho bhagava etamattham viditva tayam velayam imam udanam udanesi:
